result.arabic_text: فَقُلۡنَا ٱضۡرِبُوهُ بِبَعۡضِهَاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُحۡيِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ وَيُرِيكُمۡ ءَايَٰتِهِۦ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تَعۡقِلُونَ
result.translation: 73.Tokkel tama Sagah cadok tut Rabe num Atuka Yalli kaa Aynuwweeleeh isi Qide num Siinih warse-lek keenik inne, tokkel too Sagah cadoytat kaa yootokeeniih Yalli kaa yuynuwweeh isi Qide num keenih warseh, Yalli tama num kah yuynuwwee innah Qhiyaamah Ayro Rabe mara yaynuwweh, israa-iil xayloy Yalli isi inkittinaanee kee isi dudda tascassee isi Astooti sin yaybulleeh cubbussaanaah tamahal kaskassoowa mara takkeenimkeh.
